headline: On Utility Scam Awareness Day, PG&E Helps Customers Recognize and Avoid Utility Scams
summary: As the holiday season ramps up, scammers are also ramping up their efforts to target consumers, including utility customers. To help combat this trend, Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) is joining Utilities United Against Scams to help customers recognize potential scams as part of Utility Scam Awareness Day on November 20.
